name: Cardinal Gates Door Guardian Childproofing Lock

reviews.name: Cardinal Gates Door Guardian Childproofing Lock
reviews.reviewText: I love how even if the door is unlocked, my 2 year old cannot run outside without me knowing. It's definitely mommy approved by me!
reviews.title: Best child-proof lock for a door!

reviews.name: Cardinal Gates Door Guardian Childproofing Lock
reviews.reviewText: With 2 small children that can open the doors now. I needed a product that I could trust to keep them safe! This product has completely made us feel confident that they will not get out without adult supervision, or open the door to a stranger! And it also has given us a sense of security from intruders as well. Very Happy!
reviews.title: Very helpful!

reviews.name: Cardinal Gates Door Guardian Childproofing Lock
reviews.title: works great

reviews.name: Cardinal Gates Door Guardian Childproofing Lock
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. Does the job of keeping small children safe. Worth the money and piece of mind!
reviews.title: Great safety lock

reviews.name: Cardinal Gates Door Guardian Childproofing Lock
reviews.reviewText: The cardinal gates door guardian is everything claimed. It was inexpensive , easy to install, and provides all the door security needed to be safe. When I latch my locks before going to bed, I know I am safe for the night. I will never be with out this lock on my front door.
reviews.title: Keep the bad guy out!
